welcome_message_body: Welcome to Columbia, a charming city known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and enjoy all it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Smith's Hotel
restaurants.description: Smith's Hotel is a sandwich spot located in Columbia.

restaurants.description: Bully's Restaurant & Pub is a american restaurant located in Columbia.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Owens Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Owens Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Metropolitan Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Metropolitan Airport serves domestic flights operated by various airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Metropolitan Airport serves international flights operated by select airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
